II. Purpose of Addendum
Licensee acquired new property to relocate administrative, child and family
services.
III. Methodology
The new property and building were toured on 06/20/2017 with administrator
Richard Watkins and supervisor Tina Sentell. A description of the functions for
various parts of the building was provided.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The building was in good repair and provided additional space for providing
administrative functions and space for staff to provide appropriate foster care
services for children and families. There was adequate space to provide training
for staff and foster parents. There was also adequate space for appropriate record
storage as required by licensing rules.
The agency has submitted the required application to facilitate the change in
location.
V. Recommendation
I recommend a change in location to be identified for this child placing agency
from 8511 S. State, Millington, MI to 5397 Millington Rd., Millington, MI 48746.
